data.title: When will Carin Leon begin Boca Chueca Tour 2024? Know about deal he has signed with Virgin Music Group and Island Records
data.meta_description: Popular regional Mexican musician Carin Leon has made a new deal with two other well-known companies. Six of Leons songs have reached No. 1 on Billboard's Regional Mexican Airplay chart.
data.text:
Synopsis

Popular regional Mexican musician Carin Leon has made a new deal with two other well-known companies. Six of Leon’s songs have reached No. 1 on Billboard's Regional Mexican Airplay chart.

Popular regional Mexican musician Carin Leon, who is well-known for his soulful voice, concluded 2023 with the 10th-highest Latin touring act earnings, as per the reports of Billboard’s Boxscore charts. Now, he has revealed a new agreement between Virgin Music Group and Island Records, two major music companies, and his company, Socios Music.

Carin Leon's unique new music deal

Carin Leon and his manager, Jorge Juarez, launched the music company Socios Music and recently announced a special deal for the label. As part of this agreement, Leon's songs will be distributed and promoted by Virgin Music Group and Island Records. While Island Records will concentrate on the U.S. mainstream market, Virgin Music Group will manage distribution and marketing for the Latin American and international markets. This arrangement includes both new and older songs by Leon, such as those from his most recent album, Boca Chueca, Vol. 1. This album, which was released on May 30, peaked at No. 5 on the Billboard Regional Mexican Albums chart and No. 8 on the Top Latin Albums chart of Billboard.

Carin Leon’s success

Carin Leon's career has yielded notable accomplishments thus far. Six of his songs have reached No. 1 on Billboard's Regional Mexican Airplay chart, and he has 16 tracks that are ranked on the Hot Latin Songs chart, three of which are in the top 10. Collaborations with prominent Mexican music performers such as Grupo Firme and pop artists like Maluma, Camilo, and Kany Garcia have contributed to his hits. Leon has also ventured into country music. His bilingual song "The One (Pero No Como Yo)" with Kane Brown peaked at No. 46 on the Hot Country Songs chart of Billboard. He even debuted at the Grand Ole Opry in Nashville and performed at the Stagecoach festival.

As per the reports of 'Billboard', Carin Leon's strong team and continuous success were highlighted by JT Myers and Nat Pastor, co-CEOs of Virgin Music Group, who lauded him as an innovative and creative musician. Excited by their new cooperation with Virgin Music Group and Socios Music, Justin Eshak and Imran Majid, co-CEOs of Island Records praised Leon for being unique, bridging artistic and cultural divides.

Leon made his debut with "Me la avente" on Billboard's Regional Mexican Airplay chart in 2019, while "Tu" became a huge smash during the pandemic. Leon, who has been managed by Jorge Juárez since December 2022, has agreements with Universal Music Publishing and AEG Live.

Plans

Leon’s Boca Chueca Tour 2024 starts from Paso Robles on July 22 and travels to important locations, such as Madison Square Garden in New York City.

FAQs:

What is Carin Leon known for?

Carin Leon is renowned for his soulful voice and success as a regional Mexican musician, ranking high on Billboard's touring earnings.

What is Carin Leon's new music deal about?

Carin Leon partnered Socios Music with Virgin Music Group and Island Records to distribute and promote his music globally and in the U.S.
